title: How to Create Your Fighting Style

steps.headline: Take a moment to search yourself before creating your fighting style.
steps.description: This can include how you kick, your throws, punches, ducks, etc. Try to focus more on them.

steps.headline: Get a willing sparring partner, preferably of similar ability and similar size.
steps.description: Then practice until you get a feeling of which moves work for you and until they come out naturally.

steps.headline: Begin molding your personal fighting style.
steps.description: Be sure to make the moves yours and not something you saw off of Naruto or something.

steps.headline: Apply a moral to be perfectly confident in your fighting style.
steps.description: In order to be balanced, you must have a lighter side. A perfect example is Yin and Yang.

tyn: Bandages (for your arms, ankles, and wrists)
text: Take a moment to search yourself before creating your fighting style. This can include how you kick, your throws, punches, ducks, etc. Try to focus more on them. Get a willing sparring partner, preferably of similar ability and similar size. Then practice until you get a feeling of which moves work for you and until they come out naturally. Begin molding your personal fighting style. Be sure to make the moves yours and not something you saw off of Naruto or something. Apply a moral to be perfectly confident in your fighting style. In order to be balanced, you must have a lighter side. A perfect example is Yin and Yang.
sentences: Take a moment to search yourself before creating your fighting style.
This can include how you kick, your throws, punches, ducks, etc.
Try to focus more on them.
Get a willing sparring partner, preferably of similar ability and similar size.
Then practice until you get a feeling of which moves work for you and until they come out naturally.
Begin molding your personal fighting style.
Be sure to make the moves yours and not something you saw off of Naruto or something.
Apply a moral to be perfectly confident in your fighting style.
In order to be balanced, you must have a lighter side.
A perfect example is Yin and Yang.
